ru.nsu.gordin

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.nsu.gordin.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Model is a public class which store a field and player position, and give users set of primitive methods to control it

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Model() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getX()
      return first coordinate of player
      int getY()
      return second coordinate of player
      boolean init(int width, int heigth, int x1, int y1)
      Initialize field of the logoworld
      void set(int x1, int y1)
      set new position with coordinates x1 and y1, in contrast with Model; don't leave a trail even if set drawing true
      void setDraw(boolean b)
      set flag which leaves a visible track when player move
      void step(java.lang.String direction)
      make one step in a given direction

      • init

        public boolean init(int width,
           int heigth,
           int x1,
           int y1)
        Initialize field of the logoworld
        Parameters:
        width - of field
        heigth - of field
        x1 - first coordinate of start position
        y1 - second coordinate of start position
        Returns:
        true if field has been initialized, otherwise false

      • getX

        public int getX()
        return first coordinate of player
        Returns:

      • getY

        public int getY()
        return second coordinate of player
        Returns:

      • setDraw

        public void setDraw(boolean b)
        set flag which leaves a visible track when player move
        Parameters:
        b - a boolean value which set flag

      • step

        public void step(java.lang.String direction)
        make one step in a given direction
        Parameters:
        direction - direction in format [L|R|U|D]

      • set

        public void set(int x1,
       int y1)
        set new position with coordinates x1 and y1, in contrast with Model; don't leave a trail even if set drawing true
        Parameters:
        x1 - new first coordinate
        y1 - new second coordinate
